1.0.name: wordpress/in-series
1.0.description: In Series provides a way for you to manage stringing together posts in a series. You can add and remove individual posts from series, and reorder posts within a series, all from the post writing screen. The plugin also allows you to customize how series information (like tables of contents and next/previous links) are rendered across your site. Best of all, In Series does not require any template hacking, or knowledge of PHP -- it will work just fine right out of the box.
